text:
The <Directory> Directive to disallow the display of
directory listings specifically 
<Directory /MyDirectory/Diretory>
    Options FollowSymLinks
    AllowOverride None
</Directory>
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
My understanding is that something like "deny from all" is needed to
make Apache not serve files from a directory.  Anyway, there isn't enough
evidence here to infer a bug in Tomcat.
